description.name: usd1erc20
description.tagline: USD1 erc20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto erc20-usd1 Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept USD1 erc20 directly on your website
Unique erc20/usd1 receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your erc20/usd1 wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
